text: Dlya nikh v etoy zhizni budet nakazaniye: porazheniye, plen i kazn', yesli veruyushchiye budut priderzhivat'sya istiny. A v budushchey zhizni dlya nikh nepremenno budet nakazaniye yeshcho muchitel'neye i dlitel'neye, i nikto ne spasot ikh ot nego. Ved' Allakh Vsemogushch i nad kazhdoy veshch'yu moshchen
